channel.title: Firefox is evil
channel.description: Well, I'm going to start this out with a small introduction sentence(s). I was typing in the url to Moparisthebest, I had typed in Moparisthebest.com/smf.index <- My mistake was that I hit a period on accident, a command mistake for me. Then I watched for about 5 minutes what Firefox had to say, and trust me - firefox is an evil genius bent on us all dieing, and when it goes down, SO DO WE. "Where all going to die... MOAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!!..." Makes me wonder how high the creators of firefox where when they made this. He goes into deep detail and how sorry he is for not finding the right page for you, but you really should take some time to listen to it, its quite an entertaining 5 minutes. Try going to Moparisthebest.com/smf.index and see what happens. 404 errors rule now.
